US Stock Insights

Supplementary Terms & Conditions

By using US Stock Insights, "The Dashboard", users accept the following terms and conditions.

1. DEFINITION OF CONTENTS

The Dashboard provides access to a variety of contents related to the stock market, financial analytics, and in-depth analyses of specific aspects of companies or sectors, collectively referred to as "the Contents". The Content does not represent investment advice or investment recommendations.

The User has the option to subscribe to additional services either on a pay-per-view basis or through a subscription model. Accessing this additional Content signifies the acceptance of specific conditions associated with it.

All Contents provided in the Dashboard are exclusively available to individuals who are legally competent to enter into contracts.

2. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY - AUTHORIZED USE OF CONTENTS

The Publisher, known as Investment Analytics GmbH, holds the exclusive intellectual property rights over all components that make up the Dashboard.

All Contents, whether owned by the Publisher, the Dashboard or a Provider, are protected works under intellectual property laws.

Unauthorized reproduction, transmission, redistribution, translation, or exploitation, even if partial and for non-commercial purposes, is strictly prohibited. Engaging in such activities may result in legal consequences for counterfeiting.

The User must not:

  • download the Contents, except for individual use and for a limited duration.
  • print the Contents outside the legal boundaries of private use copying.

Any other form of use, including but not limited to embedding a hypertext link to the Dashboard, requires the express prior authorization of the Publisher. The Publisher also retains the right to implement any technical solutions to restrict the distribution or reproduction of the Contents by Users.

Furthermore, the Publisher is the sole owner of all trademarks and logos used by him. Unauthorized reproduction or use of these trademarks and logos without prior written consent from the Publisher is strictly prohibited and will be considered an infringement, holding the perpetrator accountable.

3. ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS

By accessing and using the Dashboard, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not accept these terms, you are advised not to use the Dashboard.

4. MODIFICATIONS

Investment Analytics GmbH reserves the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time. It is the responsibility of the User to regularly check for any updates. Continued use of the Dashboard after changes signifies acceptance of the revised terms.

5. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY

While Investment Analytics strives to provide accurate and up-to-date information, it does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or relevance of the Contents. Users rely on the Contents at their own risk. Investment Analytics shall not be held liable for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the Dashboard.

6. GOVERNING LAW

These Terms of Use are governed by Swiss Law. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with these terms shall be resolved in the competent courts of Zug.
